pullrequest.title: SVG support for arcs, disjoints paths and their triangulation / extrusion

content.raw: I'd just like to point out there's currently an inconsistency of behaviour between SVG extrusion and polyline SDF description. Polylines are closed automatically if the last point doesn't match the first one, but the same doesn't happen for SVGs, where open paths are just ignored.
content.html: I'd just like to point out there's currently an inconsistency of behaviour between SVG extrusion and polyline SDF description. Polylines are closed automatically if the last point doesn't match the first one, but the same doesn't happen for SVGs, where open paths are just ignored.
